item.title: Donkey Kong '94 - Game Glitch
item.description:
Donkey Kong '94 - Game Glitch

(Disclaimer: There's some jump scares in this episode, you've been warned!) Today, I take a look at some glitches and stuff in Donkey Kong for the Game Boy, otherwise known as Donkey Kong '94.

item.title: PewDiePie's Tuber Simulator - Game Glitch
item.description:
PewDiePie's Tuber Simulator - Game Glitch

Today, I take a look at some (attempted) glitches and some alleged hacks in PewDiePie's Tuber Simulator. http://www.AveryMiller.org Copyright Avery Miller Disclaimer: Fair use lets me put copyrighted material in my content without explicit permission from the copyright owner. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fair_use.

item.title: There are Some WEIRD Zootopia Games
item.description:
There are Some WEIRD Zootopia Games

Today, I take a look at some glitches in some weird Zootopia games. Weird. http://www.AveryMiller.org Copyright Avery Miller Disclaimer: Fair use lets me put copyrighted material in my content without explicit permission from the copyright owner. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fair_use.

item.title: YouTube Needs to Stop
item.description:
YouTube Needs to Stop

Update: So, as Philip Defranco said in a recent video, YouTube seems to have changed/edited the YouTube Heroes promo video. It originally said "Report negative content", not the "Report inappropriate videos accurately" shown in the clips used here. Them sneaky YouTubes. Right, so recently YouTube announced the whole new YouTube heroes thing...

item.title: HACKED Sonic Bootlegs - Game Glitch
item.description:
HACKED Sonic Bootlegs - Game Glitch

Be sure to check out Sarcastic Stag if you're interested! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC5CJDOse2mONbmmeqV1crTg Today, I take a look at some glitches in some Sonic the Hedgehog bootlegs. These games are very special. Also, after trying to render in 4K, my computer exploded. I finished the video days ago-- it just took forever to render.
